name: Jurassic Arena
summary:
Battle with ferocious dinosaurs in a prehistoric showdown that's over a million years in the making! Use powerful jaws and razor sharp claws to fight your way to victory! Pick your favorite dinosaur, step into the arena, and prove that you are the one true Jurassic Champion!

Game Features

+ ARCADE STYLE GAMEPLAY - Use combo attacks or just button mash your way into the prehistoric record books!

+ 10 JURASSIC FIGHTERS - Pick your favorite dinosaur to lay the smack down with; Tyrannosaurus Rex, Velociraptor, Spinosaurus, and many more!

+ DYNAMIC ENEMY AI - Stay sharp as your opponent adapts in real-time to give you the fight of your life!

+ BEAUTIFUL 3D ARENAS - Throw down in one of five gorgeous 3D environments!

+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition will transport you back in time to the age of dinosaurs!

Download the Jurassic Arena and battle with the most dangerous predators to ever roam the Earth!
